stimulusHtml: A function f has Maclaurin series given by 1+ x 2 2! + x 4 4! + x 6 6! +...+ x 2n ( 2n )! +... MathType@MTEF@5@5@@52D9@ . Which of the following is an expression for f(x) ?
choicesHtml: e x −sinx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D13@

e x +sinx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D08@

1 2 ( e x + e −x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FCA@

e x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3950@
